headline: Ask HN: Managed Hosting Recommendations
description:
This question has been asked here before, but not for several years, so I was wondering if any recommendations have changed. I am looking for a reliable managed VPS host where I can throw some of my hobby sites and not have to worry about them. I need a basic LAMP server with SSH, automatic SSL and unlimited websites and mysql databases. Managed, because I just want to upload and forget about maintenance.

In the past I have used:

• LiquidWeb CloudSites - Good, but they don't support automatic SSL renewal, so it became a hassle. • A2Hosting - Good, but there are some firewall quirks that have gotten me a few times and support hasn't be great. • Digital Ocean Apps - Experimented with this. Was expensive and some limitations like ephemeral filesystem. • Cloudways - Been pretty happy with this one. The control panel is a little clunky and you only get 1 DB per website, but its been pretty good for me. Support is hit or miss. • Rackspace - Good but expensive.

I can't trust any of the "10 Best Managed VPS..." articles that I find on Google because they are just affiliate link spam, so Im coming here looking for suggestions :)

headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 託管服務建議
description_zh-Hans:
这个问题以前在这里被问过，但几年来没有，所以我想知道是否有任何建议改变了。 我正在寻找一个可靠的管理型VPS主机，我可以把我的一些爱好的网站扔在那里，而不必担心它们。我需要一个基本的LAMP服务器，有SSH，自动SSL和无限的网站和mysql数据库。过去我曾使用过：

- LiquidWeb CloudSites - 不错，但他们不支持自动更新SSL，所以变得很麻烦。 - A2Hosting - 很好，但有一些防火墙的怪癖，让我有过几次，而且支持也不是很好。 - Digital Ocean Apps - 实验过这个。它很贵，而且有一些限制，如短暂的文件系统。 - Cloudways - 对这个很满意。控制面板有点笨重，每个网站只能有一个数据库，但对我来说已经很不错了。支持是命中注定的。 -

我不能相信任何我在谷歌上找到的"10 Best Managed VPS..."文章，因为它们只是联盟链接的垃圾邮件，所以我来到这里寻找建议。）
